questions.text: Your boss ask you to deploy on a Friday at 4pm?
Got confidence in your code and about to deploy on a Friday at 5pm?
Just a single line PR to deploy on a Friday at 4:30pm?
PM ask you to release at 3pm on a summer Friday?
You're two days behind, QA team needs two week to test, deploy on a Friday at 3:45PM?
It is just an ENV variable change, so what if it is 4pm on a Friday?
All I changed was Double to Float in a SQL schema, it will be fine and it's only 3pm on a Friday
